marytts.htsengine
Class GVModelSet

java.lang.Object
  marytts.htsengine.GVModelSet

public class GVModelSet
extends java.lang.Object

Set of Global Mean and (diagonal) Variance for log f0, mel-cepstrum, bandpass voicing strengths and Fourier magnitudes (the signal processing part of Fourier magnitudes is not implemented yet). Java port and extension of HTS engine version 2.0 Extension: mixed excitation

Author:
Marcela Charfuelan
